title: Wolf Tooth ShiftMount family adds 3 more ways to mix and match brakes & shifters
content:
At this point, the big brands offer pretty slick ways of integrating brake and shifter mounts. But that assumes you want to run the same brand for all of your components – and you’re OK with being limited to their adjustment range.
